remarks: Transfer eventual upper boundedness from a larger function to a smaller function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
statement:
lo1le.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
lo1le.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. <_O(1) ) $.
lo1le.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
lo1le.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. RR ) $.
lo1le.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ M <_ x ) ) -> C <_ B ) $.
lo1le $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. <_O(1) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d M x $.
$d ph x $.
